name.description: The name of the component requesting configuration, this name will be prefix onto consul and env var lookups

keys.description: JSON pointers that identify configuration keys

services.description: An array of services to look up in DNS

key.description: A JSON pointer that the client can use to retrieve the configured service

formatter.description: the name of a support Uri formatter

suffix.description: The key name (JSON pointer) to a suffix to add to the returned URI

prefix.description: The key name (JSON pointer) to a prefix to add to the host name of the returned URI

optional.description: An array of keys which are defined above in services or 'keys' which are optional (may be null)
